description: Ting som IKKE fungerer eller har feilet. Oppdateres ved problemer.

items.issue: Starting API server when already running causes EADDRINUSE error
items.context: npm run api & started server in background (PID 771400), then attempted npm run api again
items.error: Error: listen EADDRINUSE: address already in use 0.0.0.0:4100
items.root_cause: Background process not tracked, attempted to start duplicate server on same port
items.fix: Always check if port 4100 is in use before starting: netstat -tln | grep 4100 or lsof -i :4100
items.prevention: Add port-check logic to npm run api script, or use process manager like PM2
